00020 /* include some QT libraries. */
00021 #include <QtGui>

00028 /* creates the application's report gui form and data model. */
00029 ReportForm::ReportForm(QWidget *parent) : QDialog(parent) {
00030     /* create the panel for the transactions report. */
00031     createReportPanel();
00032 
00033     /* create the buttons of the report form. */
00034     closeButton = new QPushButton(closeButtonStr);
00035     clearButton = new QPushButton(clearButtonStr);
00036     showAllButton = new QPushButton(showAllButtonStr);
00037 
00038     /* add the buttons in a button box dialog. */
00039     buttonBox = new QDialogButtonBox;
00040     buttonBox->addButton(closeButton, QDialogButtonBox::AcceptRole);
00041     buttonBox->addButton(showAllButton, QDialogButtonBox::AcceptRole);
00042     buttonBox->addButton(clearButton, QDialogButtonBox::AcceptRole);
00043 
00044     /* set the signals/slots for the buttons' events. */
00045     connect(closeButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(close()));
00046     connect(showAllButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(showAllReport()));
00047     connect(clearButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(clearReport()));
00048 
00049     /* set the report panel and the button box vertically in a layout. */
00050     QVBoxLayout *mainLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00051     mainLayout->addWidget(reportPanel);
00052     mainLayout->addWidget(buttonBox, 0, Qt::AlignHCenter);
00053 
00054     /* set the layout to the report form. */
00055     setLayout(mainLayout);
00056 
00057     /* set the window title of the report form. */
00058     setWindowTitle(repoWinTitleStr);
00059 
00060     /* show/hide the header of the report view according of the records count. */
00061     reportView->horizontalHeader()->setVisible(tableModel->rowCount() > 0);
00062 
00063     /* resize the form to dekstop size and also maximize the window. */
00064     resize(QApplication::desktop()->size());
00065     showMaximized();
00066 }
00067 
00068 /* close the form and return. */
00069 void
00070 ReportForm::done(const int result) {
00071     /* return from the form. */
00072     QDialog::done(result);
00073 }

00075 /* creates the panel for the transactions report. */
00076 void
00077 ReportForm::createReportPanel() {
00078     /* create the panel for the report. */
00079     reportPanel = new QWidget;
00080 
00081     /* create the model for the report. */
00082     tableModel = new QSqlTableModel(this);
00083 
00084     /* set the table to select. */
00085     tableModel->setTable("report");
00086 
00087     /* sort in ascending order by transaction start date. */
00088     tableModel->setSort(Report_StartDate, Qt::AscendingOrder);
00089 
00090     /* set the headers text. */
00091     tableModel->setHeaderData(Report_Vehicle, Qt::Horizontal, vehicleStr);
00092     tableModel->setHeaderData(Report_Customer, Qt::Horizontal, customerStr);
00093     tableModel->setHeaderData(Report_StartDate, Qt::Horizontal, startDateStr);
00094     tableModel->setHeaderData(Report_EndDate, Qt::Horizontal, endDateStr);
00095     tableModel->setHeaderData(Report_StartTime, Qt::Horizontal, startTimeStr);
00096     tableModel->setHeaderData(Report_EndTime, Qt::Horizontal, endTimeStr);
00097     tableModel->setHeaderData(Report_Charge, Qt::Horizontal, chargeStr);
00098 
00099     /* select the model in order to apply the changes. */
00100     tableModel->select();
00101 
00102     /* create the table view of the report. */
00103     reportView = new QTableView;
00104 
00105     /* assign the model to the table view. */
00106     reportView->setModel(tableModel);
00107 
00108     /* set some operative options in the table view. */
00109     reportView->setItemDelegate(new QSqlRelationalDelegate(this));
00110     reportView->setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00111     reportView->setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectRows);
00112     reportView->setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::NoEditTriggers);
00113 
00114     /* hide the following columns. */
00115     reportView->setColumnHidden(Report_Id, true);
00116 
00117     /* perform some operations with columns' width. */
00118     reportView->resizeColumnsToContents();
00119     reportView->horizontalHeader()-> setStretchLastSection(true);
00120 
00121     /* create the buttons of the filtering options. */
00122     dateShowButton = new QPushButton(showButtonStr);
00123     vehiShowButton = new QPushButton(showButtonStr);
00124     custShowButton = new QPushButton(showButtonStr);
00125 
00126     /* create line edits and buddies objects for report filtering. */
00127     vehiFilterEdit = new QLineEdit;
00128     vehiFilterLabel = new QLabel(vehicleLabelStr);
00129     vehiFilterLabel->setBuddy(vehiFilterEdit);
00130 
00131     custFilterEdit = new QLineEdit;
00132     custFilterLabel = new QLabel(customerLabelStr);
00133     custFilterLabel->setBuddy(custFilterEdit);
00134 
00135     fromDateFilterEdit = new QDateEdit;
00136     fromDateFilterLabel = new QLabel(fromDateLabelStr);
00137     fromDateFilterLabel->setBuddy(fromDateFilterEdit);
00138 
00139     toDateFilterEdit = new QDateEdit;
00140     toDateFilterLabel = new QLabel(toDateLabelStr);
00141     toDateFilterLabel->setBuddy(toDateFilterEdit);
00142 
00143     /* set some operative options for the date edits objects. */
00144     fromDateFilterEdit->setDisplayFormat("yyyy-MM-dd");
00145     fromDateFilterEdit->setCalendarPopup(true);
00146     fromDateFilterEdit->setDate(QDate::currentDate());
00147 
00148     toDateFilterEdit->setDisplayFormat("yyyy-MM-dd");
00149     toDateFilterEdit->setCalendarPopup(true);
00150     toDateFilterEdit->setDate(QDate::currentDate());
00151 
00152     /* set the signals/slots for the buttons' events. */
00153     connect(dateShowButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(dateShowReport()));
00154     connect(vehiShowButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(vehiShowReport()));
00155     connect(custShowButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(custShowReport()));
00156 
00157     /* create a table grid. */
00158     QGridLayout *filterLayout = new QGridLayout;
00159 
00160     /* add the following objects in the appropriate position in the grid. */
00161     filterLayout->addWidget(fromDateFilterLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00162     filterLayout->addWidget(fromDateFilterEdit, 0, 1);
00163     filterLayout->addWidget(toDateFilterLabel, 0, 2, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00164     filterLayout->addWidget(toDateFilterEdit, 0, 3);
00165     filterLayout->addWidget(dateShowButton, 0, 4);
00166 
00167     filterLayout->addWidget(custFilterLabel, 0, 5, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00168     filterLayout->addWidget(custFilterEdit, 0, 6);
00169     filterLayout->addWidget(custShowButton, 0, 7);
00170 
00171     filterLayout->addWidget(vehiFilterLabel, 0, 8, 1, 1, Qt::AlignRight);
00172     filterLayout->addWidget(vehiFilterEdit, 0, 9);
00173     filterLayout->addWidget(vehiShowButton, 0, 10);
00174 
00175     /* set some GUI options for the table grid. */
00176     filterLayout->setRowMinimumHeight(0, 40);
00177     filterLayout->setRowStretch(0, 1);
00178 
00179     /* create a vertical layout. */
00180     QVBoxLayout *layoutV = new QVBoxLayout;
00181 
00182     /* add the horizontal layout. */
00183     layoutV->addLayout(filterLayout);
00184 
00185     /* add to the layout the table view. */
00186     layoutV->addWidget(reportView);
00187 
00188     /* add the layout to the panel. */
00189     reportPanel->setLayout(layoutV);
00190 }

00192 /* renew the filtering of the report table view (depends on date). */
00193 void
00194 ReportForm::dateShowReport() {
00195     /* check if the 'To Date' is less than 'From Date'. */
00196     if(toDateFilterEdit->text() < fromDateFilterEdit->text()) {
00197         /* show a message. */
00198         QMessageBox::warning(this, infoMsgTitleStr, datesRelationStr);
00199 
00200         /* just return, do nothing. */
00201         return;
00202     }
00203 
00204     /* set the filter again, which performs changes in the report view. */
00205     tableModel->setFilter(QString("start_date BETWEEN '%1' AND '%2'").arg(fromDateFilterEdit->text(),
00206                                                                           toDateFilterEdit->text()));
00207 
00208     /* fix size related issues of the report view. */
00209     fixReportSize();
00210 }
00211 
00212 /* renew the filtering of the report table view (depends on customer). */
00213 void
00214 ReportForm::custShowReport() {
00215     /* if the customer field is empty do not filter. */
00216     if(custFilterEdit->text().trimmed().isEmpty())
00217         return;
00218 
00219     /* check characters for sql injection issue. */
00220     if(custFilterEdit->text().contains(QRegExp(sqlInjectionRegExpStr))) {
00221         QMessageBox::warning(this, infoMsgTitleStr, sqlInjectCustStr);
00222         return;
00223     }
00224 
00225     /* set the filter again, which performs changes in the report view. */
00226     tableModel->setFilter(QString("customer LIKE '%%1%'").arg(custFilterEdit->text()));
00227 
00228     /* fix size related issues of the report view. */
00229     fixReportSize();
00230 }
00231 
00232 /* renew the filtering of the report table view (depends on vehicle). */
00233 void
00234 ReportForm::vehiShowReport() {
00235     /* if the vehicle field is empty do not filter. */
00236     if(vehiFilterEdit->text().trimmed().isEmpty())
00237         return;
00238 
00239     /* check characters for sql injection issue. */
00240     if(vehiFilterEdit->text().contains(QRegExp(sqlInjectionRegExpStr))) {
00241         QMessageBox::warning(this, infoMsgTitleStr, sqlInjectVehiStr);
00242         return;
00243     }
00244 
00245     /* set the filter again, which performs changes in the report view. */
00246     tableModel->setFilter(QString("vehicle LIKE '%%1%'").arg(vehiFilterEdit->text()));
00247 
00248     /* fix size related issues of the report view. */
00249     fixReportSize();
00250 }
00251 
00252 /* show all the transactions. */
00253 void
00254 ReportForm::showAllReport() {
00255     /* set a filter to get all the records. */
00256     tableModel->setFilter("");
00257 
00258     /* fix size related issues of the report view. */
00259     fixReportSize();
00260 }
00261 
00262 /* try to clear the report. */
00263 void
00264 ReportForm::clearReport() {
00265     /* set a filter to get all the records. */
00266     tableModel->setFilter("");
00267 
00268     /* if there are records in the report. */
00269     if (tableModel->rowCount()) {
00270         /* ask him/her if he/she wants to clear the report. */
00271         int r = QMessageBox::question(this, infoMsgTitleStr, clearReportStr, QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No);
00272 
00273         /* if he/she don't want it just return and do nothing. */
00274         if (r == QMessageBox::No) return;
00275 
00276         /* remove all records from the report. */
00277         tableModel->removeRows(0, tableModel->rowCount());
00278 
00279         /* apply the changes. */
00280         tableModel->submitAll();
00281     }
00282 }
00283 
00284 /* apply some fix size related issues for the report view. */
00285 void
00286 ReportForm::fixReportSize() {
00287     /* show/hide the header of the report view according of the records count. */
00288     reportView->horizontalHeader()->setVisible(tableModel->rowCount() > 0);
00289 
00290     /* perform some operations with columns' width. */
00291     reportView->resizeColumnsToContents();
00292     reportView->horizontalHeader()-> setStretchLastSection(true);
00293 }
